data.name: Fall in the Rift
data.detailed_description:
Fall in the Rift is a turn-based strategic roguelite on PC. In this game, you have to explore the Rift, in a post-apocalyptic world, in order to recover Riftium, a mineral with supernatural properties that can save the world.
Nevertheless, the adventure is far from being without danger and you will have to fight to survive: there are many hidden treasures to be found among the remains of a vanished civilization, as well as some very powerful monsters.

YOUR ADVENTURE

Start your adventure, and fully explore the Rift! Each exploration is unique and lasts about 1 hour. You must choose your path with the help of your map, and fight monsters on the battlefield. The battlefield is composed of squares, like a chess game.
Each adventurer in your team has a unique play style that you can develop by improving their skills. At the end of each exploration, you earn coins and reputation that allow you to unlock new content for future explorations.
